bibl.title: Guarantee and Jars in Sales of Wine on Delivery.
bibl.note: A new interpretation for the legal and economic background of wine sales on delivery. - I. The problem. - II. Suggestions for a solution. - III. The jars. - IV. Further remarks. - V. Summary.
bibl.seg: JAKAB Éva, Guarantee and Jars in Sales of Wine on Delivery.
